LayoutNode.Content: Asthma Overview Asthma symptoms, which include coughing, wheezing, and chest tightness, are common in an asthma attack. Sometimes asthma is called bronchial asthma or reactive airway disease. Asthma can becontrolled with proper treatment.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Asthma Overview

Asthma symptoms, which include coughing, wheezing, and chest tightness, are common in an asthma attack. Sometimes asthma is called bronchial asthma or reactive airway disease. Asthma can be controlled with proper treatment.

LayoutNode.Content: Asthma-Obesity Link May Cut Both Ways The researchers analyzed data on more than 8,600 people from 12 countries included in the European Community Respiratory Health Survey. None of the participants was obese when the surveybegan. Read Full Article
LayoutNode.SRC:
Asthma-Obesity Link May Cut Both Ways

The researchers analyzed data on more than 8,600  people from 12  countries included in the European Community Respiratory Health Survey.  None of the participants was obese when the survey began.

Read Full Article

LayoutNode.Content: Asthma is characterized by inflammation of the bronchial tubes with increased production of sticky secretions inside the tubes. People with asthma experience symptoms when the airways tighten, inflame, or fill with mucus. Common asthma symptoms include: Coughing , especially at night Wheezing Shortness of breath Chest tightness, pain, or pressure Read Article
LayoutNode.SRC:
Asthma is characterized by inflammation of the bronchial tubes with increased production of sticky secretions inside the tubes. People with asthma experience symptoms when the airways tighten,inflame, or fill with mucus. Common asthma symptoms include:Coughing, especially at nightWheezing
  • Shortness of breath
  • Chest tightness, pain, or pressure
    • Read Article
